info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 4 at 8:47AM CDT until April 7 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas...
Rabbit Creek At Kilgore affecting Gregg County.
For the Rabbit Creek...including Kilgore...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Rabbit Creek at Kilgore.
* WHEN...Until Monday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Expect lowland flooding of timber resources in and near the creek. Some oil field operations may be affected.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 4.4 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday afternoon to a crest of 10.8 feet Saturday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 900 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON
